attributes.action: Honour Capt Tom Moore with a Knighthood for his heroic fundraising for the NHS
attributes.additional_details: At the age of 99, this inspiring gentleman has undertaken the selfless task of walking 100 laps of his garden before his 100th birthday to raise money for the NHS during the Covid-19 crisis.  This is an heroic act and deserving of recognition from a grateful nation.
attributes.background: Honour Captain Tom Moore for his recent astonishing and heroic fundraising for the NHS during the Covid-19 crisis.  To happen before/outside of the New Year's Honours List due to his age.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
